long_description: The V10 mini-tool from LEZYNE is great for stashing in your jersey pocket or seat bag, and has everything you might need to make quick adjustments on the ride. CNC-machined 7075 aluminum black anodized sideplates hold 10 chrome vanadium tool bits. Includes Philips screwdriver, 2mm L-shape hex, T25 and T30 Torx wrenches and 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 standard hexes and chain tool. All bits, bolts and the chain breaker are forged and CNC-machined stainless steel.
short_description: The V10 mini-tool from LEZYNE is great for stashing in your jersey pocket or seat bag, and has everything you might need to make quick adjustments on the ride.
